# init(timeRange:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an interstitial time range object with the specified time range.

## Declaration

```swift
init(timeRange: CMTimeRange)
```

## Parameters

- **timeRange**: The time range to designate as interstitial content.

## Return Value

A new interstitial time range object.

## Discussion

To associate interstitial time ranges with an asset for playback, use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem/interstitialTimeRanges] property of an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerItem] object.
title: init(timeRange:)
